title: artrvl.co
description:
Artrvl (pronounced Art-Travel) is an international Art Projects/Festival Open Call and Curating App for communities and cities. Founded by Luanna Li, we are all about Appreciation.
We bring Artrvlers (traveling artists) and Art Hosts (from small hotel owners to government tourism offices) to meet in person, commission creations, workshops, exhibitions, Art Festivals, with hospitality, service, travel expenses or sponsorship.
artrvl.co
